remarks: Change bound variables of double restricted universal quantification, using implicit substitution, analogous to ~ cbvral2v .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jul-2017.)
statement:
cbvral2.1 $e |- F/ z ph $.
cbvral2.2 $e |- F/ x ch $.
cbvral2.3 $e |- F/ w ch $.
cbvral2.4 $e |- F/ y ps $.
cbvral2.5 $e |- ( x = z -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
cbvral2.6 $e |- ( y = w -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvral2 $p |- ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ph <-> A. z e. A A. w e. B ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d A z $.
$d B w $.
$d B x y $.
$d B y z $.
